QuestionText: What is the main purpose of an operating system?
OptionA: To act as a user interface
OptionB: To facilitate communication between hardware and software
CorrectAnswer: To facilitate communication between hardware and software

QuestionText: Which of the following is an example of an operating system?
What is a kernel in an operating system?
OptionA: The part of the operating system that manages memory and processes
OptionD: A command used in the terminal
CorrectAnswer: The part of the operating system that manages memory and processes

QuestionText: Which operating system is developed by Apple?
What does GUI stand for in the context of operating systems?
Which of the following is an open-source operating system?

OptionB: The storage space on hard drive
OptionC: Memory that is simulated by disk space
CorrectAnswer: Memory that is simulated by disk space

QuestionText: Which command is used to shut down a Linux operating system?
What does multitasking mean in an operating system?
OptionA: Running multiple operating systems at the same time
